name: Hail, Robo-Caesar!
description:
Hail, Robo Caesar! is a short game I made for Ludum Dare 36(finished late), it's probably quite broken and brutally hard...

In my original plan you fight robo-caesar at the end of the game but I ran out of time... so the title makes slightly less sense now :/

with a lot of extra work this could be good, I'll probably return to it at some point...

made in gamemaker-studio
